biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Noah Nicholas Emmerich (height 6' 3" (1,91 m) born February 27, 1965) is an American film actor who first broke out in the film Beautiful Girls. He was later seen in movies like The Truman Show, Cop Land, Frequency, Love & Sex, Windtalkers, Miracle, and Little Children.
